00025 ThPipeReader::ThPipeReader()
00026 : _pipe( 0 )
00027 , _localOffset( 0 )
00028 , _regionSize( 0 )

00033 //----------------------------------------------------------
00034 ThPipeReader::ThPipeReader( ThPipe* pipe )
00035 : _pipe( pipe )
00036 , _localOffset( 0 )
00037 , _regionSize( 0 )
00038 {
00040         if ( pipe )
00041         {
00042                 _regionSize = pipe->GetRegionSize();
00043                 _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )pipe->GetReadRegion();
00044         }
00045 }

00047 //----------------------------------------------------------
00048 ThPipeReader::~ThPipeReader()
00049 {
00050         Flush();
00051 }

00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 void
00060 ThPipeReader::Reset( ThPipe* pipe )
00061 {
00062         _pipe = pipe;
00063         _localOffset = 0;
00064         if ( pipe != 0 )
00065         {
00066                 _regionSize = pipe->GetRegionSize();
00067                 _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )pipe->GetReadRegion();
00068         }
00069         else
00070                 _regionSize = 0;
00071 }

00073 //----------------------------------------------------------
00074 tstring
00075 ThPipeReader::ReadString()
00076 {
00078         tstring str;
00079         char ch = ReadChar();
00080         while ( ch != 0 )
00081         {
00084                 str += ch;
00085                 ch = ReadChar();
00086         }
00087 
00089         return str;
00090 }

00092 //----------------------------------------------------------
00093 char
00094 ThPipeReader::ReadChar()
00095 {
00097         char ch = *GetReadLoc< char >();
00098         AdvanceOffset( sizeof( char ) );
00099 
00101         return ch;
00102 }
00103 
00104 //----------------------------------------------------------
00105 unsigned char
00106 ThPipeReader::ReadUChar()
00107 {
00109         unsigned char ch = *GetReadLoc< unsigned char >();
00110         AdvanceOffset( sizeof( unsigned char ) );
00111 
00113         return ch;
00114 }

00151 //----------------------------------------------------------
00152 void
00153 ThPipeReader::ReadBytes( void *buffer, unsigned int count )
00154 {
00156         B_ASSERT( _pipe );
00157 
00159         unsigned char* dst = ( unsigned char* )buffer;
00160 
00162         unsigned int bytesRemaining = count;
00163         unsigned int copySize = Min( bytesRemaining, ( _regionSize - _localOffset ) );
00164         MemCopy( dst, _readRegion + _localOffset, copySize );
00165         dst += copySize;
00166 
00168         while ( bytesRemaining > 0 )
00169         {
00171                 copySize = Min( bytesRemaining, _regionSize );
00172 
00174                 _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextReadRegion();
00175                 MemCopy( dst, _readRegion, copySize );
00176 
00179                 bytesRemaining -= copySize;
00180                 dst += copySize;
00181         }
00182 
00184         AdvanceOffset( count );
00185 }
00186 
00187 //----------------------------------------------------------
00188 void
00189 ThPipeReader::Skip( unsigned int bytes )
00190 {
00192         B_ASSERT( _pipe );
00193 
00195         unsigned int bytesRemaining = bytes;
00196         bytesRemaining -= Min( bytesRemaining, ( _regionSize - _localOffset ) );
00197 
00199         while ( bytesRemaining > 0 )
00200         {
00202                 if ( CrossesRegion( bytesRemaining ) )
00203                         _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextReadRegion();
00204 
00206                 bytesRemaining -= Min( bytesRemaining, _regionSize );
00207         }
00208 }
00209 
00210 //----------------------------------------------------------
00211 void
00212 ThPipeReader::Flush()
00213 {
00214         if ( _localOffset == 0 )
00215                 _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextReadRegion();
00216 }
00217 
00218 //----------------------------------------------------------
00219 bool
00220 ThPipeReader::IsDataWaiting() const
00221 {
00222         return _pipe->GetReadSignal().IsRaised();
00223 }

00226 //==========================================================
00228 //==========================================================
00229 
00230 //----------------------------------------------------------
00231 void
00232 ThPipeReader::AdvanceOffset( unsigned int count )
00233 {
00235         B_ASSERT( count > 0 );
00236 
00238         _localOffset = ( _localOffset + count ) % _regionSize;
00239         if ( _localOffset == 0 )
00240                 _readRegion = ( unsigned char* )_pipe->NextReadRegion();
00241 }
00242 
00243 //----------------------------------------------------------
00244 bool
00245 ThPipeReader::CrossesRegion( unsigned int count )
00246 {
00247         unsigned int nextOffset = _localOffset + count;
00248         return ( nextOffset > _regionSize );
00249 }
